name: CYBERKITTENS: Project Bakeneko
description:
*** Best Viewed in Full Screen ***

Content Warning: contains violent themes and language, including animal cruelty, that some folks might not like.

CYBERKITTENS: Project Bakeneko is a short Twine cyberpunk cat game about medical research and transfelinism that was the precursor to the setting released for the table-top role playing game The Sprawl. It was originally written for Unity and then recently converted to Twine.

You can find Dana Cameron at: @DAYtheELF

You can find the TTRPG version at: Dana Cameron @ Drive Thru RPG
